caption.title: Comparing experiments and simulations.
caption.p: We quantify agreement between SAXS and NMR NOE experiments by calculating the χ2. The previously determined NMR structure (Bibow et al., 2017) (PDB ID 2N5E) is labelled PDB, the unbiased MD simulation by MD, and simulations reweighted by experiments are labelled by MD and the experiments used in reweighting. Sr⁢e⁢l is a measure of the amount of reweighting used to fit the data (Bottaro et al., 2018) (see Methods for more details).
